sub-events.comment: Set up the Sector and the X and Y for each tank on start up

Moving an object forward based on it's angle. > Set X to .X + cos(.Angle) * 100 * TimeDelta > Set Y to .Y + sin(.Angle) * 100 * TimeDelta
'100' means it moves at 100 pixels per second. Replace it with a private variable and you can control the speed.

Moving an object backward based on it's angle. > Set X to .X + cos(.Angle + 180) * 100 * TimeDelta > Set Y to .Y + sin(.Angle + 180) * 100 * TimeDelta
'100' means it moves at 100 pixels per second. Replace it with a private variable and you can control the speed.
Check to see if tank is dead, if it is do not fire weapon
Ckeck to see if tank is dead, if it is do not move turret
check to see if turrent-tracking is set to "Cursor" (mouse moving turrent)
Check if using Cursor then turn off the mouse cursor

event-group.description: Update Tank Location. Find the Sector and the X and Y you are at
event-group.title: Update Tank Location
